column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Yum!!! I'm much more of a thin crust NY style pizza fan but when in Chicago you HAVE to try deep-dish!! A friend who is from Chicago recommended Lou's and man am I glad he did!! This is by far the best deep dish pizza I have ever tried!! We had a little bit of a wait before the server got to us
column2: but she was very attentive once she did. She was sure to tell us that the pizza would take 40 minutes to cook
column3: so no surprises there. You have to try this place if you are visiting Chicago!!
